title: Can You Remember Your Life 1 Second At A Time?
teaser: Director Cesar Kuriyama shoots one second of video every day as part of an ongoing project to remember the special moments of his life.
contentencoded:
Part 1 of the TED Radio Hour episode Shifting Time

About Cesar Kuriyama's TED Talk

Director Cesar Kuriyama shoots one second of video every day as part of an ongoing project to remember the special moments of his life.

About Cesar Kuriyama

Cesar Kuriyama is the creator of the 1 Second Everyday App, a tool that allows users to capture and remember a glimpse of their daily lives. As a videomaker, director, producer and animator Cesar Kuriyama has done work for Hershey's, BMW, Verizon, Gillette and the NFL.
